rows.label: bf08450100_0010
rows.name: Warrior monks of the [System:Ruby rt=Acedia ]Holy See[/System:Ruby].

rows.label: bf08450100_0020
rows.name:
So you're the Heaven's Holy Grail and her Driver? I have 
orders to relay from His Holiness Marveni.

rows.label: bf08450100_0030
rows.name:
Use the power of the Heaven's Holy Grail
to shoot down that ship right now.

rows.label: bf08450100_0050
rows.name:
What's the matter?
That's supposed to be your duty.

rows.label: bf08450100_0060
rows.name: My duty is to open the way to the World Tree.

rows.label: bf08450100_0070
rows.name: Are you refusing to do it?

rows.label: bf08450100_0080
rows.name:
In that case, we'll have to take 
the Holy Grail into custody.

rows.label: bf08450100_0100
rows.name:
So that's your scheme.
To quickly burn it all away with Hikari's power.

rows.label: bf08450100_0120
rows.name:
I never said we couldn't do it.
Tell Marveni that.

rows.label: bf08450100_0130
rows.name:
We'll be the ones to stop Shin.
So...

rows.label: bf08450100_0140
rows.name: We don't have time to stand here arguing.

rows.label: bf08450100_0150
rows.name:
If you say you won't obey,
then we will take you by force.
